function.name: sshExec
function.description: Adds an SSH Exec build step. @see SSHExec

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.sshexec.pty
param.description: Optional. Specify the type of the pty terminal. For example, "vt100". If empty, pty will not be allocated (default).

param.name: jetbrains.buildServer.sshexec.command
param.description: Specify a new-line delimited set of commands that will be executed in the remote shell. The remote shell will be started in the home directory of an authenticated user. The shell output will be available in the TeamCity build log.

example.description: Adds an SSH Exec build step with custom port and [Uploaded key authentication method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?SSH+Exec).
example.code: sshExec { name = "My SSH Exec build step" commands = """ command1 command2 """.trimIndent() targetUrl = "8.8.8.8" port = 2222 authMethod = uploadedKey { username = "username" passphrase = "credentialsJSON:******" key = "id_rsa" } }

example.description: Adds an SSH Exec build step with [Default private key authentication method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?SSH+Exec).
Adds an SSH Exec build step with pty enabled and [Custom private key authentication method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?SSH+Exec).
example.code: sshExec { name = "My SSH Exec build step" pty = "vt100" commands = """ command1 command2 """.trimIndent() targetUrl = "8.8.8.8" authMethod = customPrivateKey { keyFile = "path/to/key/file" username = "username" passphrase = "credentialsJSON:******" } }

example.description: Adds an SSH Exec build step with [Password authentication method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?SSH+Exec).
Adds an SSH Exec build step with [SSH-Agent authentication method](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?SSH+Exec). This build step will run even if some previous build steps are failed.
